channel.title: New Minecraft Server LIST == GET MORE PLAYERS!
channel.description:
Hey folks,
I recently made a new minecraft server list to allow people to advertise their minecraft servers!
Votifier enabled: [url=http://snip/url]
Feel free to add your server.
Spread word!!!!!!!! :D

item.description:
